title: Altar Frontal, 17th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: needlework on knotted net
description: Small altar frontal with five perpendicular strips of drawn work with a darned pattern of pomegranates and larger leaves in a vine design. Bottom and edge trimmed with narrow bobbin lace.

tombstone.epitaph:
Altar Frontal, 17th century.Medium: linen
Technique: needlework on knotted net. 1952-162-115.
